banner.name: I AM
banner.description: I am a Software Engineering student passionate about programming, with a focus on FrontEnd.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Santiago Chamorro, a Software Engineering student and full-stack developer with a passion for learning and collaboration. I have up-to-date skills in the software world. When I'm not immersed in programming, I excel in my hobbies, such as biking, skateboarding, playing table tennis, volleyball and other sports.
